name: Utahonotari
description: Life was so simple yet fun for Utano Yamano, until one day her grandmother disappeared. Ever since that day, a strange phenomena began to occur. Now, Utano must investigate the cause of this phenomena, while a strange girl follows her, monsters chase her, and her missing sister appears only to once again disappear. Will Utano find the cause? Or is she doomed to be cursed?
